<s> CHAPTER II </s>
<s> ON my arrival, I found that an order had already gone forth for the army to proceed immediately towards Constantinople; and the troops which had suffered least in the battle were already on their way </s>
<s> The town was full of tumult </s>
<s> The wound, and consequent inability of Argyropylo, caused Raymond to be the first in command </s>
<s> He rode through the town, visiting the wounded, and giving such orders as were necessary for the siege he meditated </s>
<s> Early in the morning the whole army was in motion </s>
<s> In the hurry I could hardly find an opportunity to bestow the last offices on Evadne </s>
<s> Attended only by my servant, I dug a deep grave for her at the foot of the tree, and without disturbing her warrior shroud, I placed her in it, heaping stones upon the grave </s>
<s> The dazzling sun and glare of daylight, deprived the scene of solemnity; from Evadne's low tomb, I joined Raymond and his staff, now on their way to the Golden City </s>
<s> Constantinople was invested, trenches dug, and advances made </s>
<s> The whole Greek fleet blockaded it by sea; on land from the river Kyat Kbanah, near the Sweet Waters, to the Tower of Marmora, on the shores of the Propontis, along the whole line of the ancient walls, the trenches of the siege were drawn </s>
<s> We already possessed Pera; the Golden Horn itself, the city, bastioned by the sea, and the ivy-mantled walls of the Greek emperors was all of Europe that the Mahometans could call theirs </s>
<s> Our army looked on her as certain prey </s>
<s> They counted the garrison; it was impossible that it should be relieved; each sally was a victory; for, even when the Turks were triumphant, the loss of men they sustained was an irreparable injury </s>
<s> I rode one morning with Raymond to the lofty mound, not far from the Top Kapou, (Cannon-gate), on which Mahmoud planted his standard, and first saw the city </s>
<s> Still the same lofty domes and minarets towered above the verdurous walls, where Constantine had died, and the Turk had entered the city </s>
<s> The plain around was interspersed with cemeteries, Turk, Greek, and Armenian, with their growth of cypress trees; and other woods of more cheerful aspect, diversified the scene </s>
<s> Among them the Greek army was encamped, and their squadrons moved to and fro--now in regular march, now in swift career </s>
<s> Raymond's eyes were fixed on the city </s>
<s> "I have counted the hours of her life," said he; "one month, and she falls </s>
<s> Remain with me till then; wait till you see the cross on St </s>
<s> Sophia; and then return to your peaceful glades" </s>
<s> "You then," I asked, "still remain in Greece" </s>
<s> "Assuredly," replied Raymond </s>
<s> "Yet Lionel, when I say this, believe me I look back with regret to our tranquil life at Windsor </s>
<s> I am but half a soldier; I love the renown, but not the trade of war </s>
<s> Before the battle of Rodosto I was full of hope and spirit; to conquer there, and afterwards to take Constantinople, was the hope, the bourne, the fulfilment of my ambition </s>
<s> This enthusiasm is now spent, I know not why; I seem to myself to be entering a darksome gulph; the ardent spirit of the army is irksome to me, the rapture of triumph null" </s>
<s> He paused, and was lost in thought </s>
<s> His serious mien recalled, by some association, the half-forgotten Evadne to my mind, and I seized this opportunity to make enquiries from him concerning her strange lot </s>
<s> I asked him, if he had ever seen among the troops any one resembling her; if since he had returned to Greece he had heard of her </s>
<s> He started at her name,--he looked uneasily on me </s>
<s> "Even so," he cried, "I knew you would speak of her </s>
<s> Long, long I had forgotten her </s>
<s> Since our encampment here, she daily, hourly visits my thoughts </s>
<s> When I am addressed, her name is the sound I expect: in every communication, I imagine that she will form a part </s>
<s> At length you have broken the spell; tell me what you know of her" </s>
<s> I related my meeting with her; the story of her death was told and re-told </s>
<s> With painful earnestness he questioned me concerning her prophecies with regard to him </s>
<s> I treated them as the ravings of a maniac </s>
<s> "No, no," he said, "do not deceive yourself,--me you cannot </s>
<s> She has said nothing but what I knew before--though this is confirmation </s>
<s> Fire, the sword, and plague </s>
<s> They may all be found in yonder city; on my head alone may they fall" </s>
<s> From this day Raymond's melancholy increased </s>
<s> He secluded himself as much as the duties of his station permitted </s>
<s> When in company, sadness would in spite of every effort steal over his features, and he sat absent and mute among the busy crowd that thronged about him </s>
<s> Perdita rejoined him, and before her he forced himself to appear cheerful, for she, even as a mirror, changed as he changed, and if he were silent and anxious, she solicitously inquired concerning, and endeavoured to remove the cause of his seriousness </s>
<s> She resided at the palace of Sweet Waters, a summer seraglio of the Sultan; the beauty of the surrounding scenery, undefiled by war, and the freshness of the river, made this spot doubly delightful </s>
<s> Raymond felt no relief, received no pleasure from any show of heaven or earth </s>
<s> He often left Perdita, to wander in the grounds alone; or in a light shallop he floated idly on the pure waters, musing deeply </s>
<s> Sometimes I joined him; at such times his countenance was invariably solemn, his air dejected </s>
<s> He seemed relieved on seeing me, and would talk with some degree of interest on the affairs of the day </s>
<s> There was evidently something behind all this; yet, when he appeared about to speak of that which was nearest his heart, he would abruptly turn away, and with a sigh endeavour to deliver the painful idea to the winds </s>
<s> It had often occurred, that, when, as I said, Raymond quitted Perdita's drawing-room, Clara came up to me, and gently drawing me aside, said, "Papa is gone; shall we go to him </s>
<s> I dare say he will be glad to see you" </s>
<s> And, as accident permitted, I complied with or refused her request </s>
<s> One evening a numerous assembly of Greek chieftains were gathered together in the palace </s>
<s> The intriguing Palli, the accomplished Karazza, the warlike Ypsilanti, were among the principal </s>
<s> They talked of the events of the day; the skirmish at noon; the diminished numbers of the Infidels; their defeat and flight: they contemplated, after a short interval of time, the capture of the Golden City </s>
<s> They endeavoured to picture forth what would then happen, and spoke in lofty terms of the prosperity of Greece, when Constantinople should become its capital </s>
<s> The conversation then reverted to Asiatic intelligence, and the ravages the plague made in its chief cities; conjectures were hazarded as to the progress that disease might have made in the besieged city </s>
<s> Raymond had joined in the former part of the discussion </s>
<s> In lively terms he demonstrated the extremities to which Constantinople was reduced; the wasted and haggard, though ferocious appearance of the troops; famine and pestilence was at work for them, he observed, and the infidels would soon be obliged to take refuge in their only hope--submission </s>
<s> Suddenly in the midst of his harangue he broke off, as if stung by some painful thought; he rose uneasily, and I perceived him at length quit the hall, and through the long corridor seek the open air </s>
<s> He did not return; and soon Clara crept round to me, making the accustomed invitation </s>
<s> I consented to her request, and taking her little hand, followed Raymond </s>
<s> We found him just about to embark in his boat, and he readily agreed to receive us as companions </s>
<s> After the heats of the day, the cooling land-breeze ruffled the river, and filled our little sail </s>
<s> The city looked dark to the south, while numerous lights along the near shores, and the beautiful aspect of the banks reposing in placid night, the waters keenly reflecting the heavenly lights, gave to this beauteous river a dower of loveliness that might have characterized a retreat in Paradise </s>
<s> Our single boatman attended to the sail; Raymond steered; Clara sat at his feet, clasping his knees with her arms, and laying her head on them </s>
<s> Raymond began the conversation somewhat abruptly </s>
<s> "This, my friend, is probably the last time we shall have an opportunity of conversing freely; my plans are now in full operation, and my time will become more and more occupied </s>
<s> Besides, I wish at once to tell you my wishes and expectations, and then never again to revert to so painful a subject </s>
<s> First, I must thank you, Lionel, for having remained here at my request </s>
<s> Vanity first prompted me to ask you: vanity, I call it; yet even in this I see the hand of fate--your presence will soon be necessary; you will become the last resource of Perdita, her protector and consoler </s>
<s> You will take her back to Windsor".-- "Not without you," I said </s>
<s> "You do not mean to separate again" </s>
<s> "Do not deceive yourself," replied Raymond, "the separation at hand is one over which I have no control; most near at hand is it; the days are already counted </s>
<s> May I trust you </s>
<s> For many days I have longed to disclose the mysterious presentiments that weigh on me, although I fear that you will ridicule them </s>
<s> Yet do not, my gentle friend; for, all childish and unwise as they are, they have become a part of me, and I dare not expect to shake them off </s>
<s> "Yet how can I expect you to sympathize with me </s>
<s> You are of this world; I am not </s>
<s> You hold forth your hand; it is even as a part of yourself; and you do not yet divide the feeling of identity from the mortal form that shapes forth Lionel </s>
<s> How then can you understand me </s>
<s> Earth is to me a tomb, the firmament a vault, shrouding mere corruption </s>
<s> Time is no more, for I have stepped within the threshold of eternity; each man I meet appears a corse, which will soon be deserted of its animating spark, on the eve of decay and corruption </s>
<s> Cada piedra un piramide levanta, y cada flor costruye un monumento, cada edificio es un sepulcro altivo, cada soldado un esqueleto vivo".[1] His accent was mournful,--he sighed deeply </s>
<s> "A few months ago," he continued, "I was thought to be dying; but life was strong within me </s>
<s> My affections were human; hope and love were the day-stars of my life </s>
<s> Now-- they dream that the brows of the conqueror of the infidel faith are about to be encircled by triumphant laurel; they talk of honourable reward, of title, power, and wealth--all I ask of Greece is a grave </s>
<s> Let them raise a mound above my lifeless body, which may stand even when the dome of St </s>
<s> Sophia has fallen </s>
<s> "Wherefore do I feel thus </s>
<s> At Rodosto I was full of hope; but when first I saw Constantinople, that feeling, with every other joyful one, departed </s>
<s> The last words of Evadne were the seal upon the warrant of my death </s>
<s> Yet I do not pretend to account for my mood by any particular event </s>
<s> All I can say is, that it is so </s>
<s> The plague I am told is in Constantinople, perhaps I have imbibed its effluvia--perhaps disease is the real cause of my prognostications </s>
<s> It matters little why or wherefore I am affected, no power can avert the stroke, and the shadow of Fate's uplifted hand already darkens me </s>
<s> "To you, Lionel, I entrust your sister and her child </s>
<s> Never mention to her the fatal name of Evadne </s>
<s> She would doubly sorrow over the strange link that enchains me to her, making my spirit obey her dying voice, following her, as it is about to do, to the unknown country" </s>
<s> I listened to him with wonder; but that his sad demeanour and solemn utterance assured me of the truth and intensity of his feelings, I should with light derision have attempted to dissipate his fears </s>
<s> Whatever I was about to reply, was interrupted by the powerful emotions of Clara </s>
<s> Raymond had spoken, thoughtless of her presence, and she, poor child, heard with terror and faith the prophecy of his death </s>
<s> Her father was moved by her violent grief; he took her in his arms and soothed her, but his very soothings were solemn and fearful </s>
<s> "Weep not, sweet child," said he, "the coming death of one you have hardly known </s>
<s> I may die, but in death I can never forget or desert my own Clara </s>
<s> In after sorrow or joy, believe that you father's spirit is near, to save or sympathize with you </s>
<s> Be proud of me, and cherish your infant remembrance of me </s>
<s> Thus, sweetest, I shall not appear to die </s>
<s> One thing you must promise,--not to speak to any one but your uncle, of the conversation you have just overheard </s>
<s> When I am gone, you will console your mother, and tell her that death was only bitter because it divided me from her; that my last thoughts will be spent on her </s>
<s> But while I live, promise not to betray me; promise, my child" </s>
<s> With faltering accents Clara promised, while she still clung to her father in a transport of sorrow </s>
<s> Soon we returned to shore, and I endeavoured to obviate the impression made on the child's mind, by treating Raymond's fears lightly </s>
<s> We heard no more of them; for, as he had said, the siege, now drawing to a conclusion, became paramount in interest, engaging all his time and attention </s>
<s> The empire of the Mahometans in Europe was at its close </s>
<s> The Greek fleet blockading every port of Stamboul, prevented the arrival of succour from Asia; all egress on the side towards land had become impracticable, except to such desperate sallies, as reduced the numbers of the enemy without making any impression on our lines </s>
<s> The garrison was now so much diminished, that it was evident that the city could easily have been carried by storm; but both humanity and policy dictated a slower mode of proceeding </s>
<s> We could hardly doubt that, if pursued to the utmost, its palaces, its temples and store of wealth would be destroyed in the fury of contending triumph and defeat </s>
<s> Already the defenceless citizens had suffered through the barbarity of the Janisaries; and, in time of storm, tumult and massacre, beauty, infancy and decrepitude, would have alike been sacrificed to the brutal ferocity of the soldiers </s>
<s> Famine and blockade were certain means of conquest; and on these we founded our hopes of victory </s>
<s> Each day the soldiers of the garrison assaulted our advanced posts, and impeded the accomplishment of our works </s>
<s> Fire-boats were launched from the various ports, while our troops sometimes recoiled from the devoted courage of men who did not seek to live, but to sell their lives dearly </s>
<s> These contests were aggravated by the season: they took place during summer, when the southern Asiatic wind came laden with intolerable heat, when the streams were dried up in their shallow beds, and the vast basin of the sea appeared to glow under the unmitigated rays of the solsticial sun </s>
<s> Nor did night refresh the earth </s>
<s> Dew was denied; herbage and flowers there were none; the very trees drooped; and summer assumed the blighted appearance of winter, as it went forth in silence and flame to abridge the means of sustenance to man </s>
<s> In vain did the eye strive to find the wreck of some northern cloud in the stainless empyrean, which might bring hope of change and moisture to the oppressive and windless atmosphere </s>
<s> All was serene, burning, annihilating </s>
<s> We the besiegers were in the comparison little affected by these evils </s>
<s> The woods around afforded us shade,--the river secured to us a constant supply of water; nay, detachments were employed in furnishing the army with ice, which had been laid up on Haemus, and Athos, and the mountains of Macedonia, while cooling fruits and wholesome food renovated the strength of the labourers, and made us bear with less impatience the weight of the unrefreshing air </s>
<s> But in the city things wore a different face </s>
<s> The sun's rays were refracted from the pavement and buildings--the stoppage of the public fountains--the bad quality of the food, and scarcity even of that, produced a state of suffering, which was aggravated by the scourge of disease; while the garrison arrogated every superfluity to themselves, adding by waste and riot to the necessary evils of the time </s>
<s> Still they would not capitulate </s>
<s> Suddenly the system of warfare was changed </s>
<s> We experienced no more assaults; and by night and day we continued our labours unimpeded </s>
<s> Stranger still, when the troops advanced near the city, the walls were vacant, and no cannon was pointed against the intruders </s>
<s> When these circumstances were reported to Raymond, he caused minute observations to be made as to what was doing within the walls, and when his scouts returned, reporting only the continued silence and desolation of the city, he commanded the army to be drawn out before the gates </s>
<s> No one appeared on the walls; the very portals, though locked and barred, seemed unguarded; above, the many domes and glittering crescents pierced heaven; while the old walls, survivors of ages, with ivy-crowned tower and weed-tangled buttress, stood as rocks in an uninhabited waste </s>
<s> From within the city neither shout nor cry, nor aught except the casual howling of a dog, broke the noon-day stillness </s>
<s> Even our soldiers were awed to silence; the music paused; the clang of arms was hushed </s>
<s> Each man asked his fellow in whispers, the meaning of this sudden peace; while Raymond from an height endeavoured, by means of glasses, to discover and observe the stratagem of the enemy </s>
<s> No form could be discerned on the terraces of the houses; in the higher parts of the town no moving shadow bespoke the presence of any living being: the very trees waved not, and mocked the stability of architecture with like immovability </s>
<s> The tramp of horses, distinctly heard in the silence, was at length discerned </s>
<s> It was a troop sent by Karazza, the Admiral; they bore dispatches to the Lord General </s>
<s> The contents of these papers were important </s>
<s> The night before, the watch, on board one of the smaller vessels anchored near the seraglio wall, was roused by a slight splashing as of muffled oars; the alarm was given: twelve small boats, each containing three Janizaries, were descried endeavouring to make their way through the fleet to the opposite shore of Scutari </s>
<s> When they found themselves discovered they discharged their muskets, and some came to the front to cover the others, whose crews, exerting all their strength, endeavoured to escape with their light barks from among the dark hulls that environed them </s>
<s> They were in the end all sunk, and, with the exception of two or three prisoners, the crews drowned </s>
<s> Little could be got from the survivors; but their cautious answers caused it to be surmised that several expeditions had preceded this last, and that several Turks of rank and importance had been conveyed to Asia </s>
<s> The men disdainfully repelled the idea of having deserted the defence of their city; and one, the youngest among them, in answer to the taunt of a sailor, exclaimed, "Take it, Christian dogs </s>
<s> take the palaces, the gardens, the mosques, the abode of our fathers--take plague with them; pestilence is the enemy we fly; if she be your friend, hug her to your bosoms </s>
<s> The curse of Allah is on Stamboul, share ye her fate" </s>
<s> Such was the account sent by Karazza to Raymond: but a tale full of monstrous exaggerations, though founded on this, was spread by the accompanying troop among our soldiers </s>
<s> A murmur arose, the city was the prey of pestilence; already had a mighty power subjugated the inhabitants; Death had become lord of Constantinople </s>
<s> I have heard a picture described, wherein all the inhabitants of earth were drawn out in fear to stand the encounter of Death </s>
<s> The feeble and decrepid fled; the warriors retreated, though they threatened even in flight </s>
<s> Wolves and lions, and various monsters of the desert roared against him; while the grim Unreality hovered shaking his spectral dart, a solitary but invincible assailant </s>
<s> Even so was it with the army of Greece </s>
<s> I am convinced, that had the myriad troops of Asia come from over the Propontis, and stood defenders of the Golden City, each and every Greek would have marched against the overwhelming numbers, and have devoted himself with patriotic fury for his country </s>
<s> But here no hedge of bayonets opposed itself, no death-dealing artillery, no formidable array of brave soldiers--the unguarded walls afforded easy entrance--the vacant palaces luxurious dwellings; but above the dome of St </s>
<s> Sophia the superstitious Greek saw Pestilence, and shrunk in trepidation from her influence </s>
<s> Raymond was actuated by far other feelings </s>
<s> He descended the hill with a face beaming with triumph, and pointing with his sword to the gates, commanded his troops to--down with those barricades--the only obstacles now to completest victory </s>
<s> The soldiers answered his cheerful words with aghast and awe-struck looks; instinctively they drew back, and Raymond rode in the front of the lines:--"By my sword I swear," he cried, "that no ambush or stratagem endangers you </s>
<s> The enemy is already vanquished; the pleasant places, the noble dwellings and spoil of the city are already yours; force the gate; enter and possess the seats of your ancestors, your own inheritance" </s>
<s> An universal shudder and fearful whispering passed through the lines; not a soldier moved </s>
<s> "Cowards" </s>
<s> exclaimed their general, exasperated, "give me an hatchet </s>
<s> I alone will enter </s>
<s> I will plant your standard; and when you see it wave from yon highest minaret, you may gain courage, and rally round it" </s>
<s> One of the officers now came forward: "General," he said, "we neither fear the courage, nor arms, the open attack, nor secret ambush of the Moslems </s>
<s> We are ready to expose our breasts, exposed ten thousand times before, to the balls and scymetars of the infidels, and to fall gloriously for Greece </s>
<s> But we will not die in heaps, like dogs poisoned in summer-time, by the pestilential air of that city--we dare not go against the Plague" </s>
<s> A multitude of men are feeble and inert, without a voice, a leader; give them that, and they regain the strength belonging to their numbers </s>
<s> Shouts from a thousand voices now rent the air--the cry of applause became universal </s>
<s> Raymond saw the danger; he was willing to save his troops from the crime of disobedience; for he knew, that contention once begun between the commander and his army, each act and word added to the weakness of the former, and bestowed power on the latter </s>
<s> He gave orders for the retreat to be sounded, and the regiments repaired in good order to the camp </s>
<s> I hastened to carry the intelligence of these strange proceedings to Perdita; and we were soon joined by Raymond </s>
<s> He looked gloomy and perturbed </s>
<s> My sister was struck by my narrative: "How beyond the imagination of man," she exclaimed, "are the decrees of heaven, wondrous and inexplicable" </s>
<s> "Foolish girl," cried Raymond angrily, "are you like my valiant soldiers, panic-struck </s>
<s> What is there inexplicable, pray, tell me, in so very natural an occurrence </s>
<s> Does not the plague rage each year in Stamboul </s>
<s> What wonder, that this year, when as we are told, its virulence is unexampled in Asia, that it should have occasioned double havoc in that city </s>
<s> What wonder then, in time of siege, want, extreme heat, and drought, that it should make unaccustomed ravages </s>
<s> Less wonder far is it, that the garrison, despairing of being able to hold out longer, should take advantage of the negligence of our fleet to escape at once from siege and capture </s>
<s> It is not pestilence --by the God that lives </s>
<s> it is not either plague or impending danger that makes us, like birds in harvest-time, terrified by a scarecrow, abstain from the ready prey--it is base superstition--And thus the aim of the valiant is made the shuttlecock of fools; the worthy ambition of the high-souled, the plaything of these tamed hares </s>
<s> But yet Stamboul shall be ours </s>
<s> By my past labours, by torture and imprisonment suffered for them, by my victories, by my sword, I swear--by my hopes of fame, by my former deserts now awaiting their reward, I deeply vow, with these hands to plant the cross on yonder mosque" </s>
<s> "Dearest Raymond" </s>
<s> interrupted Perdita, in a supplicating accent </s>
<s> He had been walking to and fro in the marble hall of the seraglio; his very lips were pale with rage, while, quivering, they shaped his angry words-- his eyes shot fire--his gestures seemed restrained by their very vehemence </s>
<s> "Perdita," he continued, impatiently, "I know what you would say; I know that you love me, that you are good and gentle; but this is no woman's work--nor can a female heart guess at the hurricane which tears me" </s>
<s> He seemed half afraid of his own violence, and suddenly quitted the hall: a look from Perdita shewed me her distress, and I followed him </s>
<s> He was pacing the garden: his passions were in a state of inconceivable turbulence </s>
<s> "Am I for ever," he cried, "to be the sport of fortune </s>
<s> Must man, the heaven-climber, be for ever the victim of the crawling reptiles of his species </s>
<s> Were I as you, Lionel, looking forward to many years of life, to a succession of love-enlightened days, to refined enjoyments and fresh-springing hopes, I might yield, and breaking my General's staff, seek repose in the glades of Windsor </s>
<s> But I am about to die!--nay, interrupt me not--soon I shall die </s>
<s> From the many-peopled earth, from the sympathies of man, from the loved resorts of my youth, from the kindness of my friends, from the affection of my only beloved Perdita, I am about to be removed </s>
<s> Such is the will of fate </s>
<s> Such the decree of the High Ruler from whom there is no appeal: to whom I submit </s>
<s> But to lose all--to lose with life and love, glory also </s>
<s> It shall not be </s>
<s> "I, and in a few brief years, all you,--this panic-struck army, and all the population of fair Greece, will no longer be </s>
<s> But other generations will arise, and ever and for ever will continue, to be made happier by our present acts, to be glorified by our valour </s>
<s> The prayer of my youth was to be one among those who render the pages of earth's history splendid; who exalt the race of man, and make this little globe a dwelling of the mighty </s>
<s> Alas, for Raymond </s>
<s> the prayer of his youth is wasted--the hopes of his manhood are null </s>
<s> "From my dungeon in yonder city I cried, soon I will be thy lord </s>
<s> When Evadne pronounced my death, I thought that the title of Victor of Constantinople would be written on my tomb, and I subdued all mortal fear </s>
<s> I stand before its vanquished walls, and dare not call myself a conqueror </s>
<s> So shall it not be </s>
<s> Did not Alexander leap from the walls of the city of the Oxydracae, to shew his coward troops the way to victory, encountering alone the swords of its defenders </s>
<s> Even so will I brave the plague--and though no man follow, I will plant the Grecian standard on the height of St </s>
<s> Sophia" </s>
<s> Reason came unavailing to such high-wrought feelings </s>
<s> In vain I shewed him, that when winter came, the cold would dissipate the pestilential air, and restore courage to the Greeks </s>
<s> "Talk not of other season than this" </s>
<s> he cried </s>
<s> "I have lived my last winter, and the date of this year, 2092, will be carved upon my tomb </s>
<s> Already do I see," he continued, looking up mournfully, "the bourne and precipitate edge of my existence, over which I plunge into the gloomy mystery of the life to come </s>
<s> I am prepared, so that I leave behind a trail of light so radiant, that my worst enemies cannot cloud it </s>
<s> I owe this to Greece, to you, to my surviving Perdita, and to myself, the victim of ambition" </s>
<s> We were interrupted by an attendant, who announced, that the staff of Raymond was assembled in the council-chamber </s>
<s> He requested me in the meantime to ride through the camp, and to observe and report to him the dispositions of the soldiers; he then left me </s>
<s> I had been excited to the utmost by the proceedings of the day, and now more than ever by the passionate language of Raymond </s>
<s> Alas </s>
<s> for human reason </s>
<s> He accused the Greeks of superstition: what name did he give to the faith he lent to the predictions of Evadne </s>
<s> I passed from the palace of Sweet Waters to the plain on which the encampment lay, and found its inhabitants in commotion </s>
<s> The arrival of several with fresh stories of marvels, from the fleet; the exaggerations bestowed on what was already known; tales of old prophecies, of fearful histories of whole regions which had been laid waste during the present year by pestilence, alarmed and occupied the troops </s>
<s> Discipline was lost; the army disbanded itself </s>

<s> A restlessness, a fear of what was about to betide, a doubt as to Raymond's purposes, urged me to return without delay to his quarters </s>

<s> I had my glass with me </s>
<s> The city basked under the noon-day sun, and the venerable walls formed its picturesque boundary </s>

<s> Horrible sights were shaped to me in the turbid cloud that hovered over the city; and my only relief was derived from the struggles I made to approach the gate </s>

<s> After an interval the explosions ceased, but the flames still shot up from various quarters; the dome of St </s>
<s> Sophia had disappeared </s>

<s> The vault above became obscured, lightning flashed from the heavy masses, followed instantaneously by crashing thunder; then the big rain fell </s>

<s> I had never entered the city before, and its ways were unknown to me </s>
<s> The streets were blocked up, the ruins smoking; I climbed up one heap, only to view others in succession; and nothing told me where the centre of the town might be, or towards what point Raymond might have directed his course </s>
<s> The rain ceased; the clouds sunk behind the horizon; it was now evening, and the sun descended swiftly the western sky </s>
<s> I scrambled on, until I came to a street, whose wooden houses, half-burnt, had been cooled by the rain, and were fortunately uninjured by the gunpowder </s>
<s> Up this I hurried--until now I had not seen a vestige of man </s>
<s> Yet none of the defaced human forms which I distinguished, could be Raymond; so I turned my eyes away, while my heart sickened within me </s>
<s> I came to an open space--a mountain of ruin in the midst, announced that some large mosque had occupied the space--and here, scattered about, I saw various articles of luxury and wealth, singed, destroyed--but shewing what they had been in their ruin--jewels, strings of pearls, embroidered robes, rich furs, glittering tapestries, and oriental ornaments, seemed to have been collected here in a pile destined for destruction; but the rain had stopped the havoc midway </s>
<s> Hours passed, while in this scene of ruin I sought for Raymond </s>
<s> Insurmountable heaps sometimes opposed themselves; the still burning fires scorched me </s>

<s> The glare of flames attested the progress of destruction, while, during mingled light and obscurity, the piles around me took gigantic proportions and weird shapes </s>

<s> Where, in this wilderness of death, art thou, O Raymond--ornament of England, deliverer of Greece, "hero of unwritten story," where in this burning chaos are thy dear relics strewed </s>

<s> I sat on the sole remaining step of an edifice, which even in its downfall, was huge and magnificent; a few broken walls, not dislodged by gunpowder, stood in fantastic groupes, and a flame glimmered at intervals on the summit of the pile </s>
<s> For a time hunger and sleep contended, till the constellations reeled before my eyes and then were lost </s>
<s> I strove to rise, but my heavy lids closed, my limbs over-wearied, claimed repose--I rested my head on the stone, I yielded to the grateful sensation of utter forgetfulness; and in that scene of desolation, on that night of despair--I slept </s>

<s> CHAPTER III </s>
<s> THE stars still shone brightly when I awoke, and Taurus high in the southern heaven shewed that it was midnight </s>
<s> I awoke from disturbed dreams </s>
<s> Methought I had been invited to Timon's last feast; I came with keen appetite, the covers were removed, the hot water sent up its unsatisfying steams, while I fled before the anger of the host, who assumed the form of Raymond; while to my diseased fancy, the vessels hurled by him after me, were surcharged with fetid vapour, and my friend's shape, altered by a thousand distortions, expanded into a gigantic phantom, bearing on its brow the sign of pestilence </s>
<s> The growing shadow rose and rose, filling, and then seeming to endeavour to burst beyond, the adamantine vault that bent over, sustaining and enclosing the world </s>
<s> The night-mare became torture; with a strong effort I threw off sleep, and recalled reason to her wonted functions </s>
<s> My first thought was Perdita; to her I must return; her I must support, drawing such food from despair as might best sustain her wounded heart; recalling her from the wild excesses of grief, by the austere laws of duty, and the soft tenderness of regret </s>
<s> The position of the stars was my only guide </s>
<s> I turned from the awful ruin of the Golden City, and, after great exertion, succeeded in extricating myself from its enclosure </s>
<s> I met a company of soldiers outside the walls; I borrowed a horse from one of them, and hastened to my sister </s>
<s> The appearance of the plain was changed during this short interval; the encampment was broken up; the relics of the disbanded army met in small companies here and there; each face was clouded; every gesture spoke astonishment and dismay </s>
<s> With an heavy heart I entered the palace, and stood fearful to advance, to speak, to look </s>
<s> In the midst of the hall was Perdita; she sat on the marble pavement, her head fallen on her bosom, her hair dishevelled, her fingers twined busily one within the other; she was pale as marble, and every feature was contracted by agony </s>
<s> She perceived me, and looked up enquiringly; her half glance of hope was misery; the words died before I could articulate them; I felt a ghastly smile wrinkle my lips </s>
<s> She understood my gesture; again her head fell; again her fingers worked restlessly </s>
<s> At last I recovered speech, but my voice terrified her; the hapless girl had understood my look, and for worlds she would not that the tale of her heavy misery should have been shaped out and confirmed by hard, irrevocable words </s>
<s> Nay, she seemed to wish to distract my thoughts from the subject: she rose from the floor: "Hush" </s>
<s> she said, whisperingly; "after much weeping, Clara sleeps; we must not disturb her" </s>
<s> She seated herself then on the same ottoman where I had left her in the morning resting on the beating heart of her Raymond; I dared not approach her, but sat at a distant corner, watching her starting and nervous gestures </s>
<s> At length, in an abrupt manner she asked, "Where is he" </s>
<s> "O, fear not," she continued, "fear not that I should entertain hope </s>
<s> Yet tell me, have you found him </s>
<s> To have him once more in my arms, to see him, however changed, is all I desire </s>
<s> Though Constantinople be heaped above him as a tomb, yet I must find him--then cover us with the city's weight, with a mountain piled above--I care not, so that one grave hold Raymond and his Perdita" </s>
<s> Then weeping, she clung to me: "Take me to him," she cried, "unkind Lionel, why do you keep me here </s>
<s> Of myself I cannot find him --but you know where he lies--lead me thither" </s>
<s> At first these agonizing plaints filled me with intolerable compassion </s>
<s> But soon I endeavoured to extract patience for her from the ideas she suggested </s>
<s> I related my adventures of the night, my endeavours to find our lost one, and my disappointment </s>
<s> Turning her thoughts this way, I gave them an object which rescued them from insanity </s>
<s> With apparent calmness she discussed with me the probable spot where he might be found, and planned the means we should use for that purpose </s>
<s> Then hearing of my fatigue and abstinence, she herself brought me food </s>
<s> I seized the favourable moment, and endeavoured to awaken in her something beyond the killing torpor of grief </s>
<s> As I spoke, my subject carried me away; deep admiration; grief, the offspring of truest affection, the overflowing of a heart bursting with sympathy for all that had been great and sublime in the career of my friend, inspired me as I poured forth the praises of Raymond </s>
<s> "Alas, for us," I cried, "who have lost this latest honour of the world </s>
<s> Beloved Raymond </s>
<s> He is gone to the nations of the dead; he has become one of those, who render the dark abode of the obscure grave illustrious by dwelling there </s>
<s> He has journied on the road that leads to it, and joined the mighty of soul who went before him </s>
<s> When the world was in its infancy death must have been terrible, and man left his friends and kindred to dwell, a solitary stranger, in an unknown country </s>
<s> But now, he who dies finds many companions gone before to prepare for his reception </s>
<s> The great of past ages people it, the exalted hero of our own days is counted among its inhabitants, while life becomes doubly 'the desart and the solitude' </s>
<s> "What a noble creature was Raymond, the first among the men of our time </s>
<s> By the grandeur of his conceptions, the graceful daring of his actions, by his wit and beauty, he won and ruled the minds of all </s>
<s> Of one only fault he might have been accused; but his death has cancelled that </s>
<s> I have heard him called inconstant of purpose--when he deserted, for the sake of love, the hope of sovereignty, and when he abdicated the protectorship of England, men blamed his infirmity of purpose </s>
<s> Now his death has crowned his life, and to the end of time it will be remembered, that he devoted himself, a willing victim, to the glory of Greece </s>
<s> Such was his choice: he expected to die </s>
<s> He foresaw that he should leave this cheerful earth, the lightsome sky, and thy love, Perdita; yet he neither hesitated or turned back, going right onward to his mark of fame </s>
<s> While the earth lasts, his actions will be recorded with praise </s>
<s> Grecian maidens will in devotion strew flowers on his tomb, and make the air around it resonant with patriotic hymns, in which his name will find high record" </s>
<s> I saw the features of Perdita soften; the sternness of grief yielded to tenderness--I continued:--"Thus to honour him, is the sacred duty of his survivors </s>
<s> To make his name even as an holy spot of ground, enclosing it from all hostile attacks by our praise, shedding on it the blossoms of love and regret, guarding it from decay, and bequeathing it untainted to posterity </s>
<s> Such is the duty of his friends </s>
<s> A dearer one belongs to you, Perdita, mother of his child </s>
<s> Do you remember in her infancy, with what transport you beheld Clara, recognizing in her the united being of yourself and Raymond; joying to view in this living temple a manifestation of your eternal loves </s>
<s> Even such is she still </s>
<s> You say that you have lost Raymond </s>
<s> O, no!--yet he lives with you and in you there </s>
<s> From him she sprung, flesh of his flesh, bone of his bone--and not, as heretofore, are you content to trace in her downy cheek and delicate limbs, an affinity to Raymond, but in her enthusiastic affections, in the sweet qualities of her mind, you may still find him living, the good, the great, the beloved </s>
<s> Be it your care to foster this similarity--be it your care to render her worthy of him, so that, when she glory in her origin, she take not shame for what she is" </s>
<s> I could perceive that, when I recalled my sister's thoughts to her duties in life, she did not listen with the same patience as before </s>
<s> She appeared to suspect a plan of consolation on my part, from which she, cherishing her new-born grief, revolted </s>
<s> "You talk of the future," she said, "while the present is all to me </s>
<s> Let me find the earthly dwelling of my beloved; let us rescue that from common dust, so that in times to come men may point to the sacred tomb, and name it his--then to other thoughts, and a new course of life, or what else fate, in her cruel tyranny, may have marked out for me" </s>
<s> After a short repose I prepared to leave her, that I might endeavour to accomplish her wish </s>
<s> In the mean time we were joined by Clara, whose pallid cheek and scared look shewed the deep impression grief had made on her young mind </s>
<s> She seemed to be full of something to which she could not give words; but, seizing an opportunity afforded by Perdita's absence, she preferred to me an earnest prayer, that I would take her within view of the gate at which her father had entered Constantinople </s>
<s> She promised to commit no extravagance, to be docile, and immediately to return </s>
<s> I could not refuse; for Clara was not an ordinary child; her sensibility and intelligence seemed already to have endowed her with the rights of womanhood </s>
<s> With her therefore, before me on my horse, attended only by the servant who was to re-conduct her, we rode to the Top Kapou </s>
<s> We found a party of soldiers gathered round it </s>
<s> They were listening </s>
<s> "They are human cries," said one: "More like the howling of a dog," replied another; and again they bent to catch the sound of regular distant moans, which issued from the precincts of the ruined city </s>
<s> "That, Clara," I said, "is the gate, that the street which yestermorn your father rode up" </s>
<s> Whatever Clara's intention had been in asking to be brought hither, it was balked by the presence of the soldiers </s>
<s> With earnest gaze she looked on the labyrinth of smoking piles which had been a city, and then expressed her readiness to return home </s>
<s> At this moment a melancholy howl struck on our ears; it was repeated; "Hark" </s>
<s> cried Clara, "he is there; that is Florio, my father's dog" </s>
<s> It seemed to me impossible that she could recognise the sound, but she persisted in her assertion till she gained credit with the crowd about </s>
<s> At least it would be a benevolent action to rescue the sufferer, whether human or brute, from the desolation of the town; so, sending Clara back to her home, I again entered Constantinople </s>
<s> Encouraged by the impunity attendant on my former visit, several soldiers who had made a part of Raymond's body guard, who had loved him, and sincerely mourned his loss, accompanied me </s>
<s> It is impossible to conjecture the strange enchainment of events which restored the lifeless form of my friend to our hands </s>
<s> In that part of the town where the fire had most raged the night before, and which now lay quenched, black and cold, the dying dog of Raymond crouched beside the mutilated form of its lord </s>
<s> At such a time sorrow has no voice; affliction, tamed by it is very vehemence, is mute </s>
<s> The poor animal recognised me, licked my hand, crept close to its lord, and died </s>
<s> He had been evidently thrown from his horse by some falling ruin, which had crushed his head, and defaced his whole person </s>
<s> I bent over the body, and took in my hand the edge of his cloak, less altered in appearance than the human frame it clothed </s>
<s> I pressed it to my lips, while the rough soldiers gathered around, mourning over this worthiest prey of death, as if regret and endless lamentation could re-illumine the extinguished spark, or call to its shattered prison-house of flesh the liberated spirit </s>
<s> Yesterday those limbs were worth an universe; they then enshrined a transcendant power, whose intents, words, and actions were worthy to be recorded in letters of gold; now the superstition of affection alone could give value to the shattered mechanism, which, incapable and clod-like, no more resembled Raymond, than the fallen rain is like the former mansion of cloud in which it climbed the highest skies, and gilded by the sun, attracted all eyes, and satiated the sense by its excess of beauty </s>
<s> Such as he had now become, such as was his terrene vesture, defaced and spoiled, we wrapt it in our cloaks, and lifting the burthen in our arms, bore it from this city of the dead </s>
<s> The question arose as to where we should deposit him </s>
<s> In our road to the palace, we passed through the Greek cemetery; here on a tablet of black marble I caused him to be laid; the cypresses waved high above, their death-like gloom accorded with his state of nothingness </s>
<s> We cut branches of the funereal trees and placed them over him, and on these again his sword </s>
<s> I left a guard to protect this treasure of dust; and ordered perpetual torches to be burned around </s>
<s> When I returned to Perdita, I found that she had already been informed of the success of my undertaking </s>
<s> He, her beloved, the sole and eternal object of her passionate tenderness, was restored her </s>
<s> Such was the maniac language of her enthusiasm </s>
<s> What though those limbs moved not, and those lips could no more frame modulated accents of wisdom and love </s>
<s> What though like a weed flung from the fruitless sea, he lay the prey of corruption-- still that was the form she had caressed, those the lips that meeting hers, had drank the spirit of love from the commingling breath; that was the earthly mechanism of dissoluble clay she had called her own </s>
<s> True, she looked forward to another life; true, the burning spirit of love seemed to her unextinguishable throughout eternity </s>

<s> I asked her where he should be buried </s>
<s> She replied, "At Athens; even at the Athens which he loved </s>
<s> Without the town, on the acclivity of Hymettus, there is a rocky recess which he pointed out to me as the spot where he would wish to repose" </s>
<s> My own desire certainly was that he should not be removed from the spot where he now lay </s>

<s> Behold now the melancholy train cross the flats of Thrace, and wind through the defiles, and over the mountains of Macedonia, coast the clear waves of the Peneus, cross the Larissean plain, pass the straits of Thermopylae, and ascending in succession Oeta and Parnassus, descend to the fertile plain of Athens </s>
<s> Women bear with resignation these long drawn ills, but to a man's impatient spirit, the slow motion of our cavalcade, the melancholy repose we took at noon, the perpetual presence of the pall, gorgeous though it was, that wrapt the rifled casket which had contained Raymond, the monotonous recurrence of day and night, unvaried by hope or change, all the circumstances of our march were intolerable </s>
<s> Perdita, shut up in herself, spoke little </s>
<s> Her carriage was closed; and, when we rested, she sat leaning her pale cheek on her white cold hand, with eyes fixed on the ground, indulging thoughts which refused communication or sympathy </s>

<s> Perdita would not enter Athens; but reposing at Marathon on the night of our arrival, conducted me on the following day, to the spot selected by her as the treasure house of Raymond's dear remains </s>
<s> It was in a recess near the head of the ravine to the south of Hymettus </s>

<s> CHAPTER IV </s>
<s> I RETURNED to my family estate in the autumn of the year 2092 </s>
<s> My heart had long been with them; and I felt sick with the hope and delight of seeing them again </s>
<s> The district which contained them appeared the abode of every kindly spirit </s>
<s> Happiness, love and peace, walked the forest paths, and tempered the atmosphere </s>
<s> After all the agitation and sorrow I had endured in Greece, I sought Windsor, as the storm-driven bird does the nest in which it may fold its wings in tranquillity </s>
<s> How unwise had the wanderers been, who had deserted its shelter, entangled themselves in the web of society, and entered on what men of the world call "life,"--that labyrinth of evil, that scheme of mutual torture </s>
<s> To live, according to this sense of the word, we must not only observe and learn, we must also feel; we must not be mere spectators of action, we must act; we must not describe, but be subjects of description </s>
<s> Deep sorrow must have been the inmate of our bosoms; fraud must have lain in wait for us; the artful must have deceived us; sickening doubt and false hope must have chequered our days; hilarity and joy, that lap the soul in ecstasy, must at times have possessed us </s>
<s> Who that knows what "life" is, would pine for this feverish species of existence </s>
<s> I have lived </s>
<s> I have spent days and nights of festivity; I have joined in ambitious hopes, and exulted in victory: now,--shut the door on the world, and build high the wall that is to separate me from the troubled scene enacted within its precincts </s>
<s> Let us live for each other and for happiness; let us seek peace in our dear home, near the inland murmur of streams, and the gracious waving of trees, the beauteous vesture of earth, and sublime pageantry of the skies </s>
<s> Let us leave "life," that we may live </s>
<s> Idris was well content with this resolve of mine </s>

<s> Winter passed away; and spring, led by the months, awakened life in all nature </s>

<s> The political state of England became agitated as the time drew near when the new Protector was to be elected </s>
<s> This event excited the more interest, since it was the current report, that if the popular candidate (Ryland) should be chosen, the question of the abolition of hereditary rank, and other feudal relics, would come under the consideration of parliament </s>
<s> Not a word had been spoken during the present session on any of these topics </s>
<s> Every thing would depend upon the choice of a Protector, and the elections of the ensuing year </s>

<s> But although St </s>

<s> Yet could England indeed doff her lordly trappings, and be content with the democratic style of America </s>

<s> This spirit we could never lose; and it was to diffuse this concentrated spirit of birth, that the new law was to be brought forward </s>
<s> We were assured that, when the name and title of Englishman was the sole patent of nobility, we should all be noble; that when no man born under English sway, felt another his superior in rank, courtesy and refinement would become the birth-right of all our countrymen </s>
<s> Let not England be so far disgraced, as to have it imagined that it can be without nobles, nature's true nobility, who bear their patent in their mien, who are from their cradle elevated above the rest of their species, because they are better than the rest </s>
<s> Among a race of independent, and generous, and well educated men, in a country where the imagination is empress of men's minds, there needs be no fear that we should want a perpetual succession of the high-born and lordly </s>

<s> The plague had come to Athens </s>
<s> Hundreds of English residents returned to their own country </s>
<s> Raymond's beloved Athenians, the free, the noble people of the divinest town in Greece, fell like ripe corn before the merciless sickle of the adversary </s>
<s> Its pleasant places were deserted; its temples and palaces were converted into tombs; its energies, bent before towards the highest objects of human ambition, were now forced to converge to one point, the guarding against the innumerous arrows of the plague </s>

<s> The devastation was not confined to the towns, but spread throughout the country; the hunter died in the woods, the peasant in the corn-fields, and the fisher on his native waters </s>
<s> A strange story was brought to us from the East, to which little credit would have been given, had not the fact been attested by a multitude of witnesses, in various parts of the world </s>
<s> On the twenty-first of June, it was said that an hour before noon, a black sun arose: an orb, the size of that luminary, but dark, defined, whose beams were shadows, ascended from the west; in about an hour it had reached the meridian, and eclipsed the bright parent of day </s>
<s> Night fell upon every country, night, sudden, rayless, entire </s>

<s> I cannot describe the rapturous delight with which I turned from political brawls at home, and the physical evils of distant countries, to my own dear home, to the selected abode of goodness and love; to peace, and the interchange of every sacred sympathy </s>

<s> At the beginning of winter our Alfred, now nine years of age, first went to school at Eton </s>
<s> This appeared to him the primary step towards manhood, and he was proportionably pleased </s>

<s> At this period, the termination of an animal's love for its offspring,--the true affection of the human parent commences </s>

<s> In all our transactions with him our honour must be inviolate, the integrity of our relations untainted: fate and circumstance may, when he arrives at maturity, separate us for ever--but, as his aegis in danger, his consolation in hardship, let the ardent youth for ever bear with him through the rough path of life, love and honour for his parents </s>
<s> We had lived so long in the vicinity of Eton, that its population of young folks was well known to us </s>

<s> Here were the future governors of England; the men, who, when our ardour was cold, and our projects completed or destroyed for ever, when, our drama acted, we doffed the garb of the hour, and assumed the uniform of age, or of more equalizing death; here were the beings who were to carry on the vast machine of society; here were the lovers, husbands, fathers; here the landlord, the politician, the soldier; some fancied that they were even now ready to appear on the stage, eager to make one among the dramatis personae of active life </s>
<s> It was not long since I was like one of these beardless aspirants; when my boy shall have obtained the place I now hold, I shall have tottered into a grey-headed, wrinkled old man </s>
<s> Strange system </s>
<s> riddle of the Sphynx, most awe-striking </s>
<s> that thus man remains, while we the individuals pass away </s>
<s> Such is, to borrow the words of an eloquent and philosophic writer, "the mode of existence decreed to a permanent body composed of transitory parts; wherein, by the disposition of a stupendous wisdom, moulding together the great mysterious incorporation of the human race, the whole, at one time, is never old, or middle-aged, or young, but, in a condition of unchangeable constancy, moves on through the varied tenour of perpetual decay, fall, renovation, and progression".[2] Willingly do I give place to thee, dear Alfred </s>
<s> advance, offspring of tender love, child of our hopes; advance a soldier on the road to which I have been the pioneer </s>
<s> I will make way for thee </s>
<s> I have already put off the carelessness of childhood, the unlined brow, and springy gait of early years, that they may adorn thee </s>
<s> Advance; and I will despoil myself still further for thy advantage </s>
<s> Time shall rob me of the graces of maturity, shall take the fire from my eyes, and agility from my limbs, shall steal the better part of life, eager expectation and passionate love, and shower them in double portion on thy dear head </s>

<s> CHAPTER V </s>
<s> SOME disorder had surely crept into the course of the elements, destroying their benignant influence </s>
<s> The wind, prince of air, raged through his kingdom, lashing the sea into fury, and subduing the rebel earth into some sort of obedience </s>
<s> The God sends down his angry plagues from high, Famine and pestilence in heaps they die </s>
<s> Again in vengeance of his wrath he falls On their great hosts, and breaks their tottering walls; Arrests their navies on the ocean's plain, And whelms their strength with mountains of the main </s>
<s> Their deadly power shook the flourishing countries of the south, and during winter, even, we, in our northern retreat, began to quake under their ill effects </s>
<s> That fable is unjust, which gives the superiority to the sun over the wind </s>
<s> Who has not seen the lightsome earth, the balmy atmosphere, and basking nature become dark, cold and ungenial, when the sleeping wind has awoke in the east </s>
<s> Or, when the dun clouds thickly veil the sky, while exhaustless stores of rain are poured down, until, the dank earth refusing to imbibe the superabundant moisture, it lies in pools on the surface; when the torch of day seems like a meteor, to be quenched; who has not seen the cloud-stirring north arise, the streaked blue appear, and soon an opening made in the vapours in the eye of the wind, through which the bright azure shines </s>
<s> The clouds become thin; an arch is formed for ever rising upwards, till, the universal cope being unveiled, the sun pours forth its rays, re-animated and fed by the breeze </s>
<s> Then mighty art thou, O wind, to be throned above all other vicegerents of nature's power; whether thou comest destroying from the east, or pregnant with elementary life from the west; thee the clouds obey; the sun is subservient to thee; the shoreless ocean is thy slave </s>
<s> Thou sweepest over the earth, and oaks, the growth of centuries, submit to thy viewless axe; the snow-drift is scattered on the pinnacles of the Alps, the avalanche thunders down their vallies </s>
<s> Thou holdest the keys of the frost, and canst first chain and then set free the streams; under thy gentle governance the buds and leaves are born, they flourish nursed by thee </s>
<s> Why dost thou howl thus, O wind </s>
<s> By day and by night for four long months thy roarings have not ceased--the shores of the sea are strewn with wrecks, its keel-welcoming surface has become impassable, the earth has shed her beauty in obedience to thy command; the frail balloon dares no longer sail on the agitated air; thy ministers, the clouds, deluge the land with rain; rivers forsake their banks; the wild torrent tears up the mountain path; plain and wood, and verdant dell are despoiled of their loveliness; our very cities are wasted by thee </s>
<s> Alas, what will become of us </s>
<s> It seems as if the giant waves of ocean, and vast arms of the sea, were about to wrench the deep-rooted island from its centre; and cast it, a ruin and a wreck, upon the fields of the Atlantic </s>
<s> What are we, the inhabitants of this globe, least among the many that people infinite space </s>
<s> Our minds embrace infinity; the visible mechanism of our being is subject to merest accident </s>
<s> Day by day we are forced to believe this </s>
<s> He whom a scratch has disorganized, he who disappears from apparent life under the influence of the hostile agency at work around us, had the same powers as I--I also am subject to the same laws </s>
<s> In the face of all this we call ourselves lords of the creation, wielders of the elements, masters of life and death, and we allege in excuse of this arrogance, that though the individual is destroyed, man continues for ever </s>
<s> Thus, losing our identity, that of which we are chiefly conscious, we glory in the continuity of our species, and learn to regard death without terror </s>
<s> But when any whole nation becomes the victim of the destructive powers of exterior agents, then indeed man shrinks into insignificance, he feels his tenure of life insecure, his inheritance on earth cut off </s>
<s> I remember, after having witnessed the destructive effects of a fire, I could not even behold a small one in a stove, without a sensation of fear </s>
<s> The mounting flames had curled round the building, as it fell, and was destroyed </s>
<s> They insinuated themselves into the substances about them, and the impediments to their progress yielded at their touch </s>
<s> Could we take integral parts of this power, and not be subject to its operation </s>
<s> Could we domesticate a cub of this wild beast, and not fear its growth and maturity </s>
<s> Thus we began to feel, with regard to many-visaged death let loose on the chosen districts of our fair habitation, and above all, with regard to the plague </s>
<s> We feared the coming summer </s>
<s> Nations, bordering on the already infected countries, began to enter upon serious plans for the better keeping out of the enemy </s>
<s> We, a commercial people, were obliged to bring such schemes under consideration; and the question of contagion became matter of earnest disquisition </s>
<s> That the plague was not what is commonly called contagious, like the scarlet fever, or extinct small-pox, was proved </s>
<s> It was called an epidemic </s>
<s> But the grand question was still unsettled of how this epidemic was generated and increased </s>
<s> If infection depended upon the air, the air was subject to infection </s>
<s> As for instance, a typhus fever has been brought by ships to one sea-port town; yet the very people who brought it there, were incapable of communicating it in a town more fortunately situated </s>
<s> But how are we to judge of airs, and pronounce--in such a city plague will die unproductive; in such another, nature has provided for it a plentiful harvest </s>
<s> In the same way, individuals may escape ninety-nine times, and receive the death-blow at the hundredth; because bodies are sometimes in a state to reject the infection of malady, and at others, thirsty to imbibe it </s>
<s> These reflections made our legislators pause, before they could decide on the laws to be put in force </s>
<s> The evil was so wide-spreading, so violent and immedicable, that no care, no prevention could be judged superfluous, which even added a chance to our escape </s>
<s> These were questions of prudence; there was no immediate necessity for an earnest caution </s>
<s> England was still secure </s>
<s> France, Germany, Italy and Spain, were interposed, walls yet without a breach, between us and the plague </s>
<s> Our vessels truly were the sport of winds and waves, even as Gulliver was the toy of the Brobdignagians; but we on our stable abode could not be hurt in life or limb by these eruptions of nature </s>
<s> We could not fear--we did not </s>
<s> Yet a feeling of awe, a breathless sentiment of wonder, a painful sense of the degradation of humanity, was introduced into every heart </s>
<s> Nature, our mother, and our friend, had turned on us a brow of menace </s>
<s> She shewed us plainly, that, though she permitted us to assign her laws and subdue her apparent powers, yet, if she put forth but a finger, we must quake </s>
<s> She could take our globe, fringed with mountains, girded by the atmosphere, containing the condition of our being, and all that man's mind could invent or his force achieve; she could take the ball in her hand, and cast it into space, where life would be drunk up, and man and all his efforts for ever annihilated </s>
<s> These speculations were rife among us; yet not the less we proceeded in our daily occupations, and our plans, whose accomplishment demanded the lapse of many years </s>
<s> No voice was heard telling us to hold </s>
<s> When foreign distresses came to be felt by us through the channels of commerce, we set ourselves to apply remedies </s>
<s> Subscriptions were made for the emigrants, and merchants bankrupt by the failure of trade </s>
<s> The English spirit awoke to its full activity, and, as it had ever done, set itself to resist the evil, and to stand in the breach which diseased nature had suffered chaos and death to make in the bounds and banks which had hitherto kept them out </s>
<s> At the commencement of summer, we began to feel, that the mischief which had taken place in distant countries was greater than we had at first suspected </s>
<s> Quito was destroyed by an earthquake </s>
<s> Mexico laid waste by the united effects of storm, pestilence and famine </s>
<s> Crowds of emigrants inundated the west of Europe; and our island had become the refuge of thousands </s>
<s> In the mean time Ryland had been chosen Protector </s>
<s> He had sought this office with eagerness, under the idea of turning his whole forces to the suppression of the privileged orders of our community </s>
<s> His measures were thwarted, and his schemes interrupted by this new state of things </s>
<s> Many of the foreigners were utterly destitute; and their increasing numbers at length forbade a recourse to the usual modes of relief </s>
<s> Trade was stopped by the failure of the interchange of cargoes usual between us, and America, India, Egypt and Greece </s>
<s> A sudden break was made in the routine of our lives </s>
<s> In vain our Protector and his partizans sought to conceal this truth; in vain, day after day, he appointed a period for the discussion of the new laws concerning hereditary rank and privilege; in vain he endeavoured to represent the evil as partial and temporary </s>
<s> These disasters came home to so many bosoms, and, through the various channels of commerce, were carried so entirely into every class and division of the community, that of necessity they became the first question in the state, the chief subjects to which we must turn our attention </s>
<s> Can it be true, each asked the other with wonder and dismay, that whole countries are laid waste, whole nations annihilated, by these disorders in nature </s>
<s> The vast cities of America, the fertile plains of Hindostan, the crowded abodes of the Chinese, are menaced with utter ruin </s>
<s> Where late the busy multitudes assembled for pleasure or profit, now only the sound of wailing and misery is heard </s>
<s> The air is empoisoned, and each human being inhales death, even while in youth and health, their hopes are in the flower </s>
<s> We called to mind the plague of 1348, when it was calculated that a third of mankind had been destroyed </s>
<s> As yet western Europe was uninfected; would it always be so </s>
<s> O, yes, it would--Countrymen, fear not </s>
<s> In the still uncultivated wilds of America, what wonder that among its other giant destroyers, Plague should be numbered </s>
<s> It is of old a native of the East, sister of the tornado, the earthquake, and the simoon </s>
<s> Child of the sun, and nursling of the tropics, it would expire in these climes </s>
<s> It drinks the dark blood of the inhabitant of the south, but it never feasts on the pale-faced Celt </s>
<s> If perchance some stricken Asiatic come among us, plague dies with him, uncommunicated and innoxious </s>
<s> Let us weep for our brethren, though we can never experience their reverse </s>
<s> Let us lament over and assist the children of the garden of the earth </s>
<s> Late we envied their abodes, their spicy groves, fertile plains, and abundant loveliness </s>
<s> But in this mortal life extremes are always matched; the thorn grows with the rose, the poison tree and the cinnamon mingle their boughs </s>
<s> Persia, with its cloth of gold, marble halls, and infinite wealth, is now a tomb </s>
<s> The tent of the Arab is fallen in the sands, and his horse spurns the ground unbridled and unsaddled </s>

<s> Our own distresses, though they were occasioned by the fictitious reciprocity of commerce, encreased in due proportion </s>
<s> Bankers, merchants, and manufacturers, whose trade depended on exports and interchange of wealth, became bankrupt </s>
<s> Such things, when they happen singly, affect only the immediate parties; but the prosperity of the nation was now shaken by frequent and extensive losses </s>
<s> Families, bred in opulence and luxury, were reduced to beggary </s>
<s> The very state of peace in which we gloried was injurious; there were no means of employing the idle, or of sending any overplus of population out of the country </s>

<s> O, for some medicinal vial to purge unwholesome nature, and bring back the earth to its accustomed health </s>
<s> Ryland was a man of strong intellects and quick and sound decision in the usual course of things, but he stood aghast at the multitude of evils that gathered round us </s>
<s> Must he tax the landed interest to assist our commercial population </s>
<s> To do this, he must gain the favour of the chief land-holders, the nobility of the country; and these were his vowed enemies--he must conciliate them by abandoning his favourite scheme of equalization; he must confirm them in their manorial rights; he must sell his cherished plans for the permanent good of his country, for temporary relief </s>
<s> He must aim no more at the dear object of his ambition; throwing his arms aside, he must for present ends give up the ultimate object of his endeavours </s>
<s> He came to Windsor to consult with us </s>
<s> Every day added to his difficulties; the arrival of fresh vessels with emigrants, the total cessation of commerce, the starving multitude that thronged around the palace of the Protectorate, were circumstances not to be tampered with </s>
<s> The blow was struck; the aristocracy obtained all they wished, and they subscribed to a twelvemonths' bill, which levied twenty per cent on all the rent-rolls of the country </s>
<s> Calm was now restored to the metropolis, and to the populous cities, before driven to desperation; and we returned to the consideration of distant calamities, wondering if the future would bring any alleviation to their excess </s>
<s> It was August; so there could be small hope of relief during the heats </s>
<s> On the contrary, the disease gained virulence, while starvation did its accustomed work </s>
<s> Thousands died unlamented; for beside the yet warm corpse the mourner was stretched, made mute by death </s>
<s> On the eighteenth of this month news arrived in London that the plague was in France and Italy </s>
<s> These tidings were at first whispered about town; but no one dared express aloud the soul-quailing intelligence </s>
<s> When any one met a friend in the street, he only cried as he hurried on, "You know"!-- while the other, with an ejaculation of fear and horror, would answer,-- "What will become of us" </s>
<s> At length it was mentioned in the newspapers </s>
<s> The paragraph was inserted in an obscure part: "We regret to state that there can be no longer a doubt of the plague having been introduced at Leghorn, Genoa, and Marseilles" </s>
<s> No word of comment followed; each reader made his own fearful one </s>
<s> We were as a man who hears that his house is burning, and yet hurries through the streets, borne along by a lurking hope of a mistake, till he turns the corner, and sees his sheltering roof enveloped in a flame </s>
<s> Before it had been a rumour; but now in words uneraseable, in definite and undeniable print, the knowledge went forth </s>
<s> Its obscurity of situation rendered it the more conspicuous: the diminutive letters grew gigantic to the bewildered eye of fear: they seemed graven with a pen of iron, impressed by fire, woven in the clouds, stamped on the very front of the universe </s>

<s> At first an unusual quantity of specie made its appearance with the emigrants; but these people had no means of receiving back into their hands what they spent among us </s>
<s> With the advance of summer, and the increase of the distemper, rents were unpaid, and their remittances failed them </s>

<s> Yet, to the honour of the English be it recorded, that, although natural disinclination made them delay awhile, yet when the misery of their fellow-creatures became glaring, an enthusiastic generosity inspired their decrees </s>

<s> Many of these, of high rank in their own countries, now, with hoe in hand, turned up the soil </s>

<s> But that country had so many resources in the way of agriculture, that the rush of population from one part of it to another, and its increase through foreign emigration, was less felt than with us </s>

<s> He remained to combat the fiend--his side unguarded, his toils unshared--infection might even reach him, and he die unattended and alone </s>
<s> By day and night these thoughts pursued me </s>
<s> I resolved to visit London, to see him; to quiet these agonizing throes by the sweet medicine of hope, or the opiate of despair </s>
<s> It was not until I arrived at Brentford, that I perceived much change in the face of the country </s>
<s> The better sort of houses were shut up; the busy trade of the town palsied; there was an air of anxiety among the few passengers I met, and they looked wonderingly at my carriage--the first they had seen pass towards London, since pestilence sat on its high places, and possessed its busy streets </s>
<s> I met several funerals; they were slenderly attended by mourners, and were regarded by the spectators as omens of direst import </s>
<s> Some gazed on these processions with wild eagerness-- others fled timidly--some wept aloud </s>
<s> Adrian's chief endeavour, after the immediate succour of the sick, had been to disguise the symptoms and progress of the plague from the inhabitants of London </s>
<s> He knew that fear and melancholy forebodings were powerful assistants to disease; that desponding and brooding care rendered the physical nature of man peculiarly susceptible of infection </s>
<s> No unseemly sights were therefore discernible: the shops were in general open, the concourse of passengers in some degree kept up </s>
<s> But although the appearance of an infected town was avoided, to me, who had not beheld it since the commencement of the visitation, London appeared sufficiently changed </s>
<s> There were no carriages, and grass had sprung high in the streets; the houses had a desolate look; most of the shutters were closed; and there was a ghast and frightened stare in the persons I met, very different from the usual business-like demeanour of the Londoners </s>
<s> My solitary carriage attracted notice, as it rattled along towards the Protectoral Palace--and the fashionable streets leading to it wore a still more dreary and deserted appearance </s>
<s> I found Adrian's anti-chamber crowded--it was his hour for giving audience </s>
<s> I was unwilling to disturb his labours, and waited, watching the ingress and egress of the petitioners </s>
<s> They consisted of people of the middling and lower classes of society, whose means of subsistence failed with the cessation of trade, and of the busy spirit of money-making in all its branches, peculiar to our country </s>
<s> There was an air of anxiety, sometimes of terror in the new-comers, strongly contrasted with the resigned and even satisfied mien of those who had had audience </s>
<s> I could read the influence of my friend in their quickened motions and cheerful faces </s>
<s> Two o'clock struck, after which none were admitted; those who had been disappointed went sullenly or sorrowfully away, while I entered the audience-chamber </s>
<s> I was struck by the improvement that appeared in the health of Adrian </s>
<s> He was no longer bent to the ground, like an over-nursed flower of spring, that, shooting up beyond its strength, is weighed down even by its own coronal of blossoms </s>
<s> His eyes were bright, his countenance composed, an air of concentrated energy was diffused over his whole person, much unlike its former languor </s>
<s> He sat at a table with several secretaries, who were arranging petitions, or registering the notes made during that day's audience </s>
<s> Two or three petitioners were still in attendance </s>
<s> I admired his justice and patience </s>
<s> Those who possessed a power of living out of London, he advised immediately to quit it, affording them the means of so doing </s>
<s> Others, whose trade was beneficial to the city, or who possessed no other refuge, he provided with advice for better avoiding the epidemic; relieving overloaded families, supplying the gaps made in others by death </s>
<s> Order, comfort, and even health, rose under his influence, as from the touch of a magician's wand </s>
<s> "I am glad you are come," he said to me, when we were at last alone; "I can only spare a few minutes, and must tell you much in that time </s>
<s> The plague is now in progress--it is useless closing one's eyes to the fact--the deaths encrease each week </s>
<s> What will come I cannot guess </s>
<s> As yet, thank God, I am equal to the government of the town; and I look only to the present </s>
<s> Ryland, whom I have so long detained, has stipulated that I shall suffer him to depart before the end of this month </s>
<s> The deputy appointed by parliament is dead; another therefore must be named; I have advanced my claim, and I believe that I shall have no competitor </s>
<s> To-night the question is to be decided, as there is a call of the house for the purpose </s>
<s> You must nominate me, Lionel; Ryland, for shame, cannot shew himself; but you, my friend, will do me this service </s>
<s> How lovely is devotion </s>
<s> Here was a youth, royally sprung, bred in luxury, by nature averse to the usual struggles of a public life, and now, in time of danger, at a period when to live was the utmost scope of the ambitious, he, the beloved and heroic Adrian, made, in sweet simplicity, an offer to sacrifice himself for the public good </s>

<s> he cried, "you have betrayed me" </s>
<s> then, springing forwards, with the air of one who had a right to command, he claimed the place of deputy as his own </s>

<s> Ryland had shewn that he preferred him </s>
<s> Never before had he, who was born even to the inheritance of the throne of England, never had he asked favour or honour from those now his equals, but who might have been his subjects </s>
